name: 3D Game Thing
body:
### Welcome to the Page for a 3D Game Thing.
This project is a small 3D Game Environment that I sue to test out developing 3D games. 

Typically this is used to test out concepts.

It is still in development and as such it is still continuously updated.
The build is updated at the end of each day, and the web demo is updated every Friday.

All assets were created by Unity Technologies.

To try it out...

http://protein.mts.uri.edu/MPet/3DThingProj/

```
Updates:

April 6, 2014
Removed unused files...
...which fixed the Unity Editor crashing
Added an NPC
```

[Back to Main Page](http://mvpet.github.io/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
